content.raw:
That's a good point. Although I think physics will not be the only one moved - rendering also will, even if it uses a different level volume (in order to avoid duplication). And with physics and rendering, the sensors may move as well, depending on how we implement them.

I'm starting to feel that we need a more concrete idea of the kinds of interfaces we will support before deciding how to split runners. Will we offer interfaces similar to model/world plugins that offer a physics interface? Visual plugins that offer an interface to ign-rendering? Will there be plugins which "belong" to a performer?
